website_summaries.verdict: A first-rate stroller that provides multiple riding positions and accepts one or two infant car seats.
pros: Includes a child tray that can swing away to allow older children to access the front seat
Parent tray features covered storage and cupholders
Folds compactly for easy storage and travel
cons: Limited spacing between the stroller seats
Wheels are hard and small, which can make it difficult to push the stroller

customer_reviews.title: I am so happy I purchased this specific product
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I am so happy I purchased this specific product. I am 5'9" and it is a perfect height. I don't have to slouch to push this stroller. I have a 3yr old, and 9mo old who fit on/in it, and I can strap down camping chairs/fishing equipment to go out to paved lakes and not have to make a dozen trips. It's not too long/wide to be a hassle getting through doors, and I can't say enough good things about all the cupholders. I use cupholders for drinks, toys, fries...kids and cupholders. It was easy to assemble. And it's not too heavy. Great product. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie E. Alefi

customer_reviews.title: Must have for infant and toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love it for my infant and toddler combo. It’s so convenient and I take it everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, affordable.
customer_reviews.text: I got this in spite of the mixed reviews on it accepting the Graco snugride click connect car seats. The chart does say that it will only fit in the back and it does. It will click but loosely so I suggest using the provided straps to keep it secured tight. Also, if you put the baby car seat on the back, make sure to have sealed beverage cups. It's right over baby and I would be weary of hot drinks spilling on them. As seen in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Realtra Dark

customer_reviews.title: Nice until I had to stop using infant seat
customer_reviews.text: At first I really liked this for the most part. My oldest rider was really comfy and I could use my infant car seat for my younger one. Now that he’s grown out of the infant seat, I hate it. My oldest is uncomfortable. The front seat never stays propped up so my oldest constantly has a seat in his space. He also hates the seat in the back. It’s just not spaced out well. And my last complaint is the awful wheels. They are hard and small and it makes it not only hard to push and steer but very bumpy for the kids
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is awesome! My two year old daughter loves it and it fits our son's car seat perfectly. It's very easy to assemble and pretty nifty as far as swapping the car seat to the front or back and having as many cup holders and bottom storage space! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ajduvall

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of it, however, I should’ve opted for the more expensive brand. My graco click and connect car seat does not fit securely as stated. The stroller itself is very difficult to maneuver, I thought my toddler had his foot on the tire it was so difficult to turn. Lastly it’s a little bulkier than I expected length wise but it is a double stroller after all. Not very good in the city where there is limited sidewalk space and small doorway entries
customer_reviews.author: oangie

customer_reviews.title: Good stroller for a baby who never sleeps
customer_reviews.text: The baby section in the front reclines a maximum of 1 inch more or less. If you have a baby, then you need a different stroller unless you can train your baby to fall asleep sitting straight up. I was very disappointed as it seemed really good in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable stroller for 2
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. I haven't fully used it yet cause baby #2 has yet to arrived. But I was playing around with it and it super comfortable for my 2 year old to sit in the front. It pushes and glides easy. Big basket at the bottom. For the price I think this is the best stroller if you have multiple kids. Very affordable you can't beat the price. Folds up pretty good doesn't take a lot of the space in my trunk. Love it. I also bought the baby trend car seat so I don't have any issues connecting car seat to stroller
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Decent stroller
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a double stroller that my car seat would click into, and I opted for this one because it was less expensive than the Graco model I considered. I haven't used this yet, but my Graco car seat will only click into the rear, so I kind of wish I'd spent the extra on the Graco. The biggest drawback is that there will be just cupholders and no try for the front seat when I have the carseat clicked into the rear.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller. Light and very easy to use. Kids enjoyed it and so did we. Didin't have any issues with it. Worth the buy.
customer_reviews.text: The Sit and Stand Stroller works great for both my children. My older child has grown out of the flat seat area. But when she fit, my younger daughter was happy in the front and my older daughter was happy in the back seat. The stroller is light, just as we hoped. Very smooth and easy to maneuver. my husband enjoyed using it with my children. It is also very easy to collapse and store away. Does not take up a lot of room in the trunk of a car. It was a VERY USEFULL stroller. We loved it and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: My infant was comfortable in the front and my 5 year old was ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was exactly what I needed for Disney. My infant was comfortable in the front and my 5 year old was able to stand in the back when he was tired. There are so many cup holders, which was awesome! The 2 negative comments I have is the shade isn't no enough for me, and the stroller doesn't stand up when being stored. It has to be propped up or laying on it's side.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Returning asap.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up being disappointed with this stroller. I was upset to realize that the back doesn't have a seat like the front. Was told my carseat was compatible and its not, one rough wiggle and the carseat will slide right out. Only thing that holds the carseat in is a clip strap across the lap section of the carseat. The brands website has a seat you can buy. But its not compatible with this model, as I was told via customer service. Will be returning this stroller asap.
customer_reviews.author: Pheona

customer_reviews.title: Did not work well with Graco carseat
customer_reviews.text: Returned. Bought this as reviews indicated it worked well with the Graco Snuglock infant carseat. Locking mechanism did NOT work as advertised--does not actually lock in, just sits on 2 very small and fragile tabs that fold in and out. Was very easy to push carseat onto the ground with light pressure on the feet. We read the instructions a number of times and there was no extra stabilizing feature we had missed. Seemed cheap and poorly made. Would not recommend for infant carseats of different brands. We ended up buying a similar Graco double stroller, locks easily and was $50 cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: We used this stroller for the first time today and absolutely love it. Our son is 4 and daughter is 2 and both liked riding in it. They also took turns on who would sit in the back. We're expecting our 3rd this fall and looking forward to using it for our newborn. It's pretty easy to manuver, but was more difficult when having to push it through the grass or dirt/sand. We love this thing and wish we had gotten sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: great stoller for mutliple kids
customer_reviews.text: great product. came perfect condition. No issues. went together perfectly. great for our 5 and 2 year old on long trips or places where you don't want them running wild. folds easy, lots of cool features (wheel locks, cup holders, storage baskets, etc.) this is a stroller for 2!! so yes its big, heavy and in some instances hard to maneuver but that should be expected when buying a stroller of this type!
customer_reviews.author: Nacole M Breitbach

customer_reviews.title: affordable stroller
customer_reviews.text: Seats should both be made the same , I don’t like the back seat that has no support . Diaper bag barley fits in bottom basket storage. And my son hangs on the cup holder in back and it comes off easily, spilled my drink . baby car seat fits but leaves my son with little space in back with car seat attached. if you have 2 kids and need a Cheap stroller then it’s doable but 2 full seats would be better . Easy to assemble, folds easily, takes up car trunk space .
customer_reviews.author: Whitney Bufford

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is great if you have plans to visit an amusement park ...
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great if you have plans to visit an amusement park with your kids. My youngest sits in the front and my oldest in the back. It is also very nice and easy for the kids to get in and out. I’m very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unlocking and locking is the worst
customer_reviews.text: DONT BUY!! this stroller is very hard to unlock especially if you have two kids ! its not worth fighting with while trying to make sure your kids are in sight!!! takes alot of force to lock and unlock!! also putting it together some pieces came broken and others wernt labled properly so it was tough to figure out what went where!!! not the best double stroller out there
customer_reviews.author: annom

customer_reviews.title: Very good dual-seat stroller
customer_reviews.text: For a dual-seat stroller this is a 4-star. Very easy to use once you grasp the seating and folding concept. Read the instructions carefully. Much of the assembly is self-explanatory without reading. I wish the wheels were made of rubber or composite as opposed to plastic. The plastic wheels make for a ride which it doesn’t feel like the wheels hug the ground. Otherwise a very good stroller.
customer_reviews.author: fiveonestar

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works for our generic kind of carseat carrier. Lots of straps that can be used to secure it, even though we generally just set the thing in there for short walks. Easy to reconfigure if you want the carseat to be in the front or back. Stable and fairly smooth while walking. Best price point out there!!! Definitely worth the $95.
customer_reviews.author: EHop

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this stroller! It might be heavier than some would prefer, but it's sturdy enough to hold my 50 lb four year old when needed along with a baby. Simple to collapse, easy strap adjustment, and navigates well on pavement. The storage underneath is really handy as well as the four cup holders and small 'mommy' compartment. Definitely recommend to parents with kids 1-3 years apart.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, got this for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller, got this for my daughter....Gets everyone everywhere they need to go safely. The only thing I wish were that the toddler/forward facing seat had a tray (which the cup holder is built into) that would have a hinge and actually open-- in order to get the child out easier...that is difficult...plus the seatbelt are hard to adjust...
customer_reviews.author: Brightness

customer_reviews.title: A great way to travel with 2 little ones
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was very helpful when our grandkids went to an amusement park in Branson. The one year old sat in the front section while the 3 year old had the option of sitting or standing in the back section. It also allowed the 3 year old to get down and walk when she needed to run off some energy. Highly recommend this product when you have two little ones
customer_reviews.author: Ms. J

customer_reviews.title: Good Stroller for Older Kids
customer_reviews.text: Used for Disney vacation for a 6 and 8 year old. Did its job! The only issue we had was that it was very hard to maneuver with turns especially. Other than that, which was a pain to deal with, it was a good stroller for two older kids and a long vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M

customer_reviews.title: Check compatibility carefully.
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a decent budget stroller, except that it's not compatible with a babytrend flexloc infant car seat. (Which it claims it is) It cannot sit on the 2 anchor points (only 1 at a time), and customer service said this was not important. I sent them the picture I posted here, and they said they couldn't see a problem. You can decide for yourself if your child should be secure or not, I returned this stroller immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Yang David Hull

customer_reviews.title: Nice stroller
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a double stroller for my new grandbaby. So I bought this sit n stand stroller. It was easy to fold. Not real light but lighter than the others. I bought the infant car seat that attaches to this stroller as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shena Moody

customer_reviews.title: Best buy as a mother of 4
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 small children and bought this for our trip to Disney. There are new size requirements and for the price it was an amazing investment. All 3 children were able to utilize at the same time. 1 in the front, 1 sitting facing the front on the rear seat and 1 standing. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Steven Morales

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the Amusement Park with 2 Kids
customer_reviews.text: We have a 4 year old and 7 month old and this was perfect for a day at the amusement park. The only downside is the front seat doesn't recline very far (which we read on other reviews prior to purchasing). When the baby was awake it was no problem at all and our 4 year old LOVED being able to sit or stand when he wanted. It was easy in the airport as well.
customer_reviews.author: PM_Libby

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great price!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this stroller. It comfortably fits our chicco keyfit 30 in the back and our toddler on the front. We did learn that you need to have the lap tray in the back for the car seat to fit comfortably. It’s easy to take on trips and simple to push even with the baby and toddler. Our 2 year old also loves standing on the back when the baby isn’t in the car seat! Great product and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Antosiak

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions are simple and easy to read but I'm not strong enough to get cupholder secured on top. Compared to my old double stroller, this one is more complicated to fold and takes quite a bit of force to get it started. It's pretty heavy but slim enough once collapsed. Overall, I'm happy. Anxious to see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my almost 3 yr old and 6 month old . Also my graco snug ride carseat fits great in the rear seat and front if wanted. I was hesitant to buy but so glad I did and also took a risk on an open box and it was brand new, no imperfections at all . Its heavy but to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller but 5 point harness too small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this stroller and it's great. Very sturdy, pushes smoothly in any direction, and of course is compatible with car seats. My only issue with it is the 5 point harness on the front seat. It doesnt extend far enough. My 3 year old is small for his age and the shoulder straps cant buckle on him even if they're loostened all the way. The straps need more length! Fix this issue and I would give the stroller 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Stroller came almost fully assembled. I got confused on how to attach a car seat that I bought separately but their customer service rep helped me to figure it out
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t as light weight as I’d like. I still love this stroller for how convenient it is. I can have my 2yo in the front and my newborn in the car seat strapped to the back by the handle bar. It’s not as easy to fold either, I don’t know if this is because it’s new & needs to be worn in. Fits perfectly in the truck of my Pacifica.
customer_reviews.author: C.Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Wheels stick in front. Kinda hard to get car seat off front. Use for toddler and baby- car seat ( baby trend jogger combo) other than that I loveeee this stroller it’s soo easy for me and my two kids. Even can fit the pupper in the bottom
customer_reviews.author: Yupp

customer_reviews.title: Poorest quality
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. Been using it for a few months and regretting every tine. It’s super heavy uncomfortable for the baby. Storage is made out of the thinnest material that makes no sense why. If I put anything in it the bottom touches the ground and makes it hard to walk. Feels like it’s been made by someone who have never had their own kids. This stroller is like a bad karma. I wish I never came along this add. How did me and the baby deserve all this. Too late to return too poor to get a new one :(
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Hit the road
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my new born and 1 year old the wheels make it easy to maneuver over holes and and raised sidewalks. Also has a lot of space in the basket even when I have them both in the stroller with the carseat
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: Durable and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 2 granddaughter...we plan on very many Zoo trips this summer!!! Also I used this brand of stroller for my kids many years ago and it lasted thru all 4 of them!!!
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and handy!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this stroller to match the baby trend car seat I got for my son. He is now 6 mo old and my daughter is 4 yr old and this stroller/carseat combo works amazing!! We use it on family trips and site seeing. Has plenty of storage and will last threw the years!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: ashley_kjellsen

customer_reviews.title: Light weight double stroller
customer_reviews.text: Needed a double stroller for a family trip. Well worth the price. Easy to open and close. The front seat does not recline all the way down, it tilts back about two inches
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: I can't see why you would need to spend more on a double stroller when one like this is available! No regrets, wish we would have got it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: sky

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: CARSEATS DO NOT CONNECT TO THE STROLLER!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hate this stroller, THE CARSEATS DO NOT CONNECT TO IT AT ALL, I HAD TO USE THE STRAPS & THERE'S NOT ENOUGH ROOM IN THE BACK FOR MY DAUGHTER TO SIT, STRICTLY STANDING
customer_reviews.author: Daijah Penn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to store.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think we'd find a double stroller as inexpensive as this one that would be so perfect. Oldest is 2 1/2 years and a 4 month old and this stroller fits them perfectly in more than one configuration. Changing the set up is really easy, and it fits in my Nissan Sentra trunk (considered a compact car)
customer_reviews.author: Robinson & Laura

customer_reviews.title: highly satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this soon much. I also bought the infant carseat that is compatable with it.  I am in love with both. All my friends got jealous when they found out the price compared with other brands. The carseat is very light compared to other carseats. It fits on the stroller perfectly. The stroller is the lightest I found for 2 kids. It is easy to fold and very small when folded and doesn't fill up my trunk like other double strollers I have seen. I have been using these 2 items for almost a year. I am highly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: R. Natouf

customer_reviews.title: Really useful
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 3yo and his new brother. It's being one of the best purchases to handle securitaly the baby and the toddler. Now after one year of usage they still love it. I only wish the front seat would have the recline option to sleep when the kid behind is not there.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: Graco carseat didnt really work with this stroller. I had to return
customer_reviews.author: marisabel

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Makes hauling the kids around easy. Some what hard to control and make turns, does not take bumps well, if it had tired that was filled with air this product would be a home run
customer_reviews.author: Kyle W

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money! It’s a little heavy but that is to be expected with a double stroller. Does the job and happy you can convert it in different ways. Seems like a good quality stroller but it is a little hard to maneuver sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kinser

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller!!! I am very short and this stroller is so easy to handle. Not too heavy, when loading and unloading. Easy to switch from collapsed to upright. Plenty of drink/snack holders for two kids and mom. Compartment for keys/money and possibly a small phone. For the price, I cannot get over the price!!!!! Suck amazing quality for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: chasity

customer_reviews.title: Hard to turn with 2 kids
customer_reviews.text: When you use with 2 kids, a baby and a toddler its so hard to move to the side, and its very heavy, not light weight, but easy to fold
customer_reviews.author: isabella penarrubia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller! Super easy to assemble, folds up nicely, fits my graco snugride (classic connect) car seat with plenty of room for another kid on the bench seat, lots of functional cup holders, and really doesn't take up much more space than my single graco stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Good smimple double unit stroller
customer_reviews.text: There is a newer more expensive model at Target and was almost 75 more. This is well worth the price and is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: BKNJ17

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I have a babytrend car seat. It is well worth the $110 ballpark price. It moves around good, was easy to understand the instructions on how to put the car seat in the front or back, and came packaged nicely and as expected. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Umm I don’t know why lightweight was in the selection prior to writing this review. It’s really heavy but it works. It folds easily and I assembled it by myself.
customer_reviews.author: Cydney Aguas

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to use stroller! Definitely a good choice for anyone with a newborn and toddler and looking for an in between.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this stroller I have a 3 year old who’s always along for the ride and my one year old sits in front. It’s easy to steer and fold and unfold. GREAT VALUE FOR THE PRICE. Definitely recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Critical reviewer that doesn’t like to waste money

customer_reviews.title: but other than that extremely pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Water bottles don't stay in cup holders, but other than that extremely pleased with purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Y.

customer_reviews.title: Shower gift!
customer_reviews.text: Mother-to-be was extremely pleased with her double stroller. Great value for product/price.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Double stroller
customer_reviews.text: Serves its purpose. Good for the money. Be careful because not all baby car seats are compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Soraya Phanord

customer_reviews.title: steers nicely, and carseat clicks in with ease
customer_reviews.text: Durable, folds up compactly, steers nicely, and carseat clicks in with ease. I use this nearly every day with two children. This is so much easier to use at the grocery store than a cart. It folds up so quickly and fits in my Ford Fusion trunk with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stroller!
customer_reviews.text: My 13mos old grandson and my 1wk old grandson are safely and easily transported with it. I highly recommend this item for anyone that needs a double stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and lots of options for configuration
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and has lots of options, Graco car seat could mount better. But it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This stroller was extremely easy to assemble and it works perfect for my 3 year old and 5 year old. It is very sturdy and I love that it has 5 cup holders.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Duvak

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller. It's not too comfortable if the baby ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. It's not too comfortable if the baby in front falls asleep but otherwise serves its purpose. My 5 yr old grandson likes to go on walks but cannot make it the whole way; his 9 mo old brother sits in front and he can ride when he gets tired of walking. It's easy to fold and unfold.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Great double stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my 2 year old and newborn. We love it! I didn’t love it while assembling it because it was a bit difficult, but after I figured it out, it’s been very easy to use. It fits in our SUV and my mom’s car a lot easier than I expected with a double stroller. It’s also not too difficult to navigate in smaller spaces and I like that it isn’t too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: It’s big enough to fit all three of my children
customer_reviews.text: Really big comfortable has lots of storage and cup holders. Fits my 10 month old and my 2 and 4 year old and the quality and price is unbeatable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge and durable.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. Lots of storage but huge and hard to maneuver. Not to go through aisles.
customer_reviews.author: Janae Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product but
customer_reviews.text: Great product but it does not fit my carseat like the website and links said it would. It's going to take some tweaking to get it to work 😩
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. Can't do nothing about the size but it is very functional and the toddler loves it too!
customer_reviews.author: Martinique

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I had a different version of this stroller but was a bit bigger . This one much more compact and i like that. Works great with my 3 year old in front and my infant in back in his carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Natosha Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Live it love it love it. Fits most car seats. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Feather

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We took this to Disneyland with our 10 month old and 5 year old and it was amazing! Easy to push, easy to fold down and comfortable for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Shauna Kahn

customer_reviews.title: Very nice design for the size
customer_reviews.text: For the size of this product it is extremely lightweight and easy to fold up when not in use. Just push, slide and pull up. I just wish there was a way to stand it up without it rolling away. I'll be keeping it in my truck so it's not that big of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Baker

customer_reviews.title: Small double stroller
customer_reviews.text: I needed a double stroller for my kiddos that would fit in my small trunk. I have a 2014 Chevy Cruze and it fits without the umbrella attached.
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna K

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Does the job great. Both my infant and toddler ride along great. Does however takes up space but that's to be expected. For the price and convenience it's a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: pelotas

customer_reviews.title: Great for when you have two kids to tow around
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 year old and a two month old. Works perfect for them. My oldest is a little too big for the front seat but sits in the back nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Laci Trujillo

customer_reviews.title: We absolutely love this sit and stand stroller
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this sit and stand stroller. It's great for our toddler and our infant. Our toddler loves that he can get in and out easy and we love that we can strap him in as well. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Travis Spurgeon

customer_reviews.title: Storage is difficult but does the job
customer_reviews.text: It does it’s job at a double stroller. Fairly easy to assemble. Our car seat is only compatible with the back section. Our biggest issue is the folding and storing in our car. It’s difficult to fold and recently the front wheel has been jamming so when we unfold it, the left one doesn’t touch the ground.
customer_reviews.author: MM671

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great! It is easy to assemble and even easier to fold and unfold, which is very convenient. I have 4 children and this has something for all of them. The spot for the car seat, the baby seat, my toddler can sit in the back on the seat, cup holders out the wazoo. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Maybe not the BEST choice
customer_reviews.text: We use this for day to day walks with my two little girls. Unfortunately this particular model is a bit rough to turn and the wheels constantly get stuck. The girls typically walk so the stroller only has a toy or two and a couple of cups and snacks. Was pretty disappointed TBH
customer_reviews.author: robert h.

customer_reviews.title: The stroller is mehhhh
customer_reviews.text: Not the most convenient stroller....but my sons are content in it. The wheels have to be a certain way before you fold it up. You cannot prop the stroller while folded unless it's awkwardly leaning against something. The safety belt for the sit and stand is kinda a joke. It gets the job done on the bright side.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and compact, fits easily in any normal size 4 door sedan/mini suv.
customer_reviews.author: Usman p.

customer_reviews.title: very heavy, bulky, and takes a lots of space in your car or home
customer_reviews.text: Very heavy, bulky, and takes a lots of space in your car or home. The rear seat doesn't have any back support.
customer_reviews.author: abul k. azad

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stroller. My kids really like it and I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stroller. My kids really like it and I love how versatile it is. I can either put the infant seat in the front or the back and same as my 2 year old. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Dake

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: I just u boxed my stroller today and put it together it was definitely worth it!! I love it so much better the my other double stroller!! It will be so much more convenient once the new baby is born with my toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan J Frank

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: Meets my expectations. I have a graco infant seat for my one month old and I also have a two year old. I am disappointed that the infant seat simply rests on the frame with a nylon strap and clip to secure it. I worry about it tipping over with rambunctious children around.
customer_reviews.author: Momma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this stroller for a great deal! Absolutely love this stroller!
customer_reviews.author: mariah

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use, very versitile.  Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was expecting. I would definitely recommend to others. I own other products from this manufacturer and have been satisfied with all of them. This model, while not light, seems light compared to its size. Also light compared to other similar products. The plastic parts "feel" a little cheap compared to other manufacturers, but I haven't had any issues with bending or breaking parts. Absolutely no malfunctions. Opening and collapsing the stroller is simple, even compared to other single strollers I've used. My older son enjoys the multiple options he has when his brother's car seat is in this stroller. That makes it much easier to get him into it, and keep him in it when we're moving.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew N. Kuntemeier

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FOT MAXI COSI CAR SEAT
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit a maxi cosi car seat orderd this for both my daughters toddler (5) fits perfect who is 48lbs but the car seat does not snap in it does come with a strap that clips and secures it tightly but it does not clip in.
customer_reviews.author: Florence Olszewski

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I really love it 5 star thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rahat Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: This was the worst stroller I’ve ever used. I took this stroller on a trip with me to Disney world and I couldn’t maneuver this at all. If I could give it no stars I would i was stuck using it during my trip and I absolutely hated it. Would not recommend this at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Sheikah

customer_reviews.title: Rip in handle
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box there was a rip in the handle (see images). The height of the handle bar is good for tall people. Trying to get a replacement or something to fix the rip because other then that I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Trina A.

customer_reviews.title: very convenient
customer_reviews.text: With a three year old and a 7 month old this is a great item to have. ive used it to go to parks and events and even use it when i go walking for exercising purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Shuntranette R Sudds

customer_reviews.title: 100% Satisfied and Reccomend!  Love it
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it. Glad we found this one.. Owned for a while no issues to report.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller for my grandkids. Easy to assemble. I love the stand for the older child. Lightweight and easy to maneuver even with both kids riding.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cheek

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: A very good stroller! Although it's able to carry so much weight it still is easy to push. Going over curbs and up sidewalks is no problem either. I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sallie

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the stroller is perfect. Is huge but is perfect for 2 kids
customer_reviews.author: Dariza

customer_reviews.title: It works for me with my Chicco Keyfit30
customer_reviews.text: I actually got my Chicco to work in this! It took some time but I figured it out. I used the bottom strap as a holder instead of it going over the car seat. I made it fit under it.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the easiest to steer. With 2 kids it gets difficult to maneuver... but good for 75#s total weight
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compatible with evenflo nurture car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Put it together in less than 10 minutes! We love it. I looked everywhere for a stroller that will fit the evenflo nurture car seat and with this one it actually clicks right into place.
customer_reviews.author: alexandrea

product_meta.title: Baby Trend Sit N Stand Ultra Stroller, Millennium
product_meta.description:
Color:MillenniumThe Sit N Stand Ultra stroller has multiple riding positions, allowing children to sit or stand along the ride, or use an infant car seat in both the front and rear facing seats. The Sit N Stand Ultra stroller can accept one or two infant car seats, (sold separately) all Baby Trend infant car seats, and select models from other brands to create a travel system. Please refer to our car seat compatibility chart. Folds compactly for easy storage and travel, large storage basket, and has a foot activated brake. The unique rear facing seat allows your older child, (up to 50 lbs.) to ride or they can easily forward face to stand on the sturdy stand on platform. The child tray conveniently can swing away allowing even older children easy access to the front seat, the parent tray has covered storage with cupholders, with a second child cupholder for your older standing or rear facing child. To clean the seat pad, use only mild household soap or detergent and warm water on a sponge or clean cloth.

BRAND STORY
By Baby Trend
feature_bullets: Accommodates up to 2 children sitting in stroller seats, up to 2 in infant car seats,(sold separately) or one sitting and one standing
Stroller allows your older child to stand on the rear platform or sit on the rear seat. Features two removable cup holders
Accepts one or two infant car seats (sold separately) and accommodates all Baby Trend Infant Car Seats and select models from other brands to create a travel system
Stroller accommodates 2 children up to 50 pounds each. Front/Back Seat: Sit upright unassisted ~ 50 lbs or 40 Inch. Jump Seat: 2 1/2 years ~ 50 lbs
Large basket, and compact fold for easy transport and storage. JPMA Certified
Accommodates up to 2 children sitting in stroller seats, up to 2 in infant car seats, or one sitting and one standing
Stroller allows your older child to stand on the rear platform or sit on the rear seat
Accepts up to 2 Baby Trend, Graco Snugride Classic Fit and Britax infant car seats to make a travel system
Stroller accomodates 2 children up to 50 pounds each
Large Basket and easy compact fold for easy transporation or storage
